Title: AN ACT TO AMEND COMMONWEALTH ACT NUMBERED FOUR HUNDRED AND SIXTY-NINE ENTITLED "AN ACT APPRROPRIATING EIGHT MILLION ONE HUNDRED EIGHTY THOUSAND PESOS FOR PUBLIC WORKS", AS AMENDED.
Data:
[ Commonwealth Act No. 611, August 29, 1940 ]
AN ACT TO AMEND COMMONWEALTH ACT NUMBERED FOUR HUNDRED AND SIXTY-NINE ENTITLED "AN ACT APPRROPRIATING EIGHT MILLION ONE HUNDRED EIGHTY THOUSAND PESOS FOR PUBLIC WORKS", AS AMENDED.
Be it enacted by the National Assembly of the Philippines:
Section 1. The following items of appropriation under section two, subsection A, paragraph (a), of Commonwealth Act Numbered Four hundred and sixty-nine, are amended so as to read as follows:

"BULACAN


"20. For the Angat municipal building
P10,000.00


"CAGAYAN


"26. For a home economics building in Dugo, Mamalaniugan
3,000.00


"LANAO


"5a. For the Marandig barrio school, Kolambugan
1,000.00


"5b. For additional rooms for the Liannga barrio school, Kolambugan
1,000.00


"6a. For laying down of streets in the municipality of Iligan
4,000.00


"9. For the artesian wells in Camps I, II, and III, Tubud, Kolambugan
2,000.00


"10. For the artesian wells in Kawit, Iligan
1,000.00




"12. For the Boru-an artesian well, Iligan
1,000.00


"MARINDUQUE



"30. For the Mansaban River dike, Boac
1,500.00


"MOUNTAIN PROVINCE


"7. For the Home Economics Building, Bontoc Central School
2,500.00


"7a. For the repair and reconstruction of the Industrial School Building, Bontoc Central School
1,500.00


"NUEVA ECIJA


"22. For the Central School, Sto. Domingo
1,200.00


"22a. For the Dolores barrio school, Sto. Domingo
1,500.00



Section 2. Item 43 under Ilocos Norte in section two, subsection A, paragraph (a), of Commonwealth Act Numbered Four hundred and sixty-nine, as amended by Commonwealth Act Numbered Five hundred and sixty-four, is further amended so as to read as follows:



"43. For drilling an artesian well at barrio Mandaloque, municipality of Dingras ..
700.00


"43a. For an artesian well, Lumbad, Dingras
600.00



Section 3. Item 40 under Laguna in section two, subsection A, paragraph (a), of Commonwealth Act Numbered Four hundred and sixty-nine, as amended by Commonwealth Act Numbered Five hundred and sixty-four, is further amended so as to read as follows:



"40.ℒαwρhi৷ For the San Bartolome Elementary School, San Pablo
2,500.00



Section 4. Item 54 under Ilocos Sur in section two, subsection A, paragraph (a), of Commonwealth Act Numbered Four hundred and sixty-nine, as amended by Commonwealth Act Numbered Five hundred and eight, is further amended so as to read as follows:



"54. For two artesian wells in poblacion, Tagudin
1,000.00



Section 5. The following items of appropriation in section two, subsection A, paragrar>h (a), of Commonwealth Act Numbered Four hundred and sixty-nine are suppressed:
Items 13, 14, 17, 23, 27, 28, and 29 under Lanao.
Section 6. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved, August 29, 1940, with the exception of the following items: Section 1: Bulacan, item 20 ; Caga-yan, item 20; Cagayan, item 26; Marinduque, item 30. Section 4: Ilocos Sur, item 54.
